name: Escape From Trivium
description:
This is a short prototype that emerged during GMC JAM 37. 
Theme: "it knows something you don't". Or not... if you're good at trivia!

It's a "dungeon crawler/trivia game where you need to escape from the dungeons of Trivia, which are riddled with monsters. Battle them in 1v1 trivia duels or die trying...

Controls:

  •  "A" and "D" or right mouse click to move
  •  Left mouse click to choose answers

There are some known issues I might resolve later.
